skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

This unit has variable  Missile Block Chance depending on which side of the unit is hit by a projectile.
	
	The missile block chance multiplier of each direction is:
	 1.0x at the front
	 0.5x at the sides
	 0.1x at the rear

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The dread carriages of the Ruinous hosts are more than just machines of war; they are symbols of status and power.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

	The missile block chance multiplier of each direction is:
	 1.0x at the front
	 0.5x at the sides
	 0.1x at the rear

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: This large, slithering monstrosity of Slaanesh is a prized mount among Daemonettes, hissing and snapping with preternatural speed and mesmerising with their terrible gaze.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: A handsome hero is sure to tempt many, drawing the unwitting into the Prince of Pleasure's fold.
This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Those whom Slaanesh favours with His mark are gifted with extraordinary senses, and not just the usual five. Weak-willed and the hesitant foes draw them almost irresistibly.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: All servants of Chaos are loathsome in their own way, and those of Slaanesh especially so, for their foul demeanour mirrors urges one would do anything not to acknowledge.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Among the most insidious of Slaanesh's gifts renders the enemy unwilling to hurt His favoured devotees, and even willing to praise them.
We will enjoy this.
There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

	The missile block chance multiplier of each direction is:
	 1.0x at the front
	 0.5x at the sides
	 0.1x at the rear

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Mine desire is all, mortal wretch!"
The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.
Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

effects.description: Attacks cause "'Orrible Smell!" effect, reducing leadership

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.
The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.
Enemies break like brittle twigs beneath the onslaught of such overwhelming strength.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.
The champion can channel the dark strength flowing through his veins to deliver a single blow that can shatter a fortress wall.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Dark Prince watches, always, and takes great pleasure in the actions of his followers.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +50% chance of wounding aggressors

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

	 Hide Forest
	 Stalk
	 Unspottable
